name: riscfetch
catch: RISC-V only. Exits on other architectures.
description: Display RISC-V info in neofetch style. ISA extensions, hart count, hardware IDs and more.

og.title: riscfetch
og.description: System information tool for RISC-V architecture

features.title: 144 Extensions
features.description: 98 Z-extensions and 46 S-extensions. Grouped by category for easy reading.

features.title: 13 Vendor Logos
features.description: Pine64, SiFive, StarFive, Milk-V, Sipeed, T-Head, Kendryte, Allwinner, Espressif, SpacemiT, Sophgo, WCH.

features.title: Explain Mode
features.description: -e shows what each extension does. -a shows all 144 with ✓/✗ checkmarks.

features.title: JSON Output
features.description: -j for machine-readable output. Easy to integrate into scripts and CI/CD.

features.title: Complements fastfetch
features.description: -r shows RISC-V info only. Combine with fastfetch for full system details.
